DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study obtain reference data health-related quality life functional symptom scale single item European Organisation Research Treatment Cancer Core Quality-of-Life Questionnaire ( EORTC QLQ C30 ) representative sample Slovenian general population .
DOC.brief_title: Health-related Quality Life General Slovenian Population
DOC.detailed_description: A sample least 600 people Slovenian population , randomly select , age 18 year , represent geografic diversity , take part postal survey . The EORTC QLQ C30 questionnaire demografic data send mail . This first study obtain reference data EORTC QLQ C30 sample general Slovenian population . The result serve guideline interpret health-related quality-of-life different group patient .
DOC.criteria: age 18 serious comorbidity previously treat cancer
